scripts.hold-build: pnpm outline book.pdf && pnpm front -p book.pdf -o book.outline.json && pnpm split book.pdf -o book-pages && pnpm body -d book-pages -o book.outline.json -b book.body.xml && pnpm back -p book.pdf -o book.outline.json && pnpm assemble --header book.teiHeader.xml --front book.front.xml --body book.body.xml --back book.back.xml -o final-transcription.tei.xml
scripts.hold-build-test: pnpm front -p book.pdf -o book.outline.json && pnpm split book.pdf -o book-pages && pnpm body -d book-pages -o book.outline.json --max-pages 10 -b book.body.test.xml && pnpm back -p book.pdf -o book.outline.json --max-pages 5 && pnpm assemble --header book.teiHeader.xml --front book.front.xml --body book.body.test.xml --back book.back.xml -o final-transcription.test.tei.xml
